install.readme:
This will Install the Custom Form Mod by LHVWB. This is the install process for SMF 2 Beta. If you are not using SMF 2 Beta then the install process will not work.
This Mod allows you to create forms for users to submit posts to certain boards in a structured manner. Its uses could include, Structured Support Forms, Staff Application Forms, Error Reporting Forms and etc.
I hope that you find this Mod useful. LHVWB

uninstall.readme: This will Uninstall the Custom Form Mod by LHVWB
